interface.name: UIClientPropertyKey
interface.javadoc:
This interface is used only for tagging keys for client properties for {@code JComponent} set by UI which needs to be cleared on L&F change and serialization. All such keys are removed from client properties in {@codeJComponent.setUI()} method after uninstalling old UI and before intalling the new one. They are also removed prior to serialization.
Igor Kushnirskiy
